Title: Inception
Description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets embarks on a mission to plant an idea into a CEO's mind.
Author: Christopher Nolan

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of small-time criminals intertwine in this non-linear crime drama.
Author: Quentin Tarantino

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Author: Frank Darabont

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City, Batman must confront his most formidable adversary to save the city.
Author: Christopher Nolan

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The life story of a man with a low IQ, who inadvertently influences several historical events in America.
Author: Robert Zemeckis

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.
Author: Francis Ford Coppola

Title: Jurassic Park
Description: During a preview tour of a theme park, a dinosaur expert and his team must fight for their lives when the creatures escape.
Author: Steven Spielberg

Title: The Avengers
Description: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Thor, and Captain America, team up to save the world from a powerful threat.
Author: Joss Whedon

Title: Interstellar
Description: A group of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.
Author: Christopher Nolan

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Description: A man undergoes a procedure to erase the memories of his failed relationship but soon realizes he doesn't want to forget.
Author: Michel Gondry

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Description: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of American soldiers plot to assassinate high-ranking Nazi officials during a film premiere.
Author: Quentin Tarantino

Title: The Revenant
Description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead.
Author: Alejandro González Iñárritu

Title: Avatar
Description: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.
Author: James Cameron

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by a corrupt emperor and forced into slavery.
Author: Ridley Scott

Title: The Social Network
Description: The story of the creation of Facebook and the legal battles that followed, as told from the perspective of its founders.
Author: David Fincher

Title: In Bruges
Description: Two hitmen hide out in Bruges, Belgium, after a job goes wrong, leading to darkly comedic and dramatic consequences.
Author: Martin McDonagh

Title: The Departed
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.
Author: Martin Scorsese

Title: Casablanca
Description: In World War II-era Morocco, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with whom he becomes entangled in a web of intrigue.
Author: Michael Curtiz

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another killer on the loose.
Author: Jonathan Demme

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
Author: David Fincher

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
Author: Peter Jackson

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Description: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.
Author: Justin K. Thompson

Title: The Matrix
Description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
Author: Lilly Wachowski

Title: Blade Runner
Description: In a dystopian future, a detective hunts down replicants, bioengineered beings, while questioning his own humanity.
Author: Ridley Scott

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The life story of a man with a low IQ, who inadvertently influences several historical events in America.
Author: Robert Zemeckis

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.
Author: Francis Ford Coppola

Title: Jurassic Park
Description: During a preview tour of a theme park, a dinosaur expert and his team must fight for their lives when the creatures escape.
Author: Steven Spielberg

Title: The Avengers
Description: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Thor, and Captain America, team up to save the world from a powerful threat.
Author: Joss Whedon

Title: Interstellar
Description: A group of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.
Author: Christopher Nolan

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Description: A man undergoes a procedure to erase the memories of his failed relationship but soon realizes he doesn't want to forget.
Author: Michel Gondry

Title: Schindler's List
Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, a businessman saves the lives of over a thousand Polish-Jewish refugees.
Author: Steven Spielberg

Title: The Green Mile
Description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a giant black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
Author: Frank Darabont

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by a corrupt emperor and forced into slavery.
Author: Ridley Scott

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A young hobbit, Frodo, must embark on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring and prevent an evil lord from taking over Middle-earth.
Author: Peter Jackson

Title: Saving Private Ryan
Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
Author: Steven Spielberg

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another killer on the loose.
Author: Jonathan Demme

Title: The Terminator
Description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill the mother of the future leader of the human resistance, but a soldier is also sent back to protect her.
Author: James Cameron

Title: Titanic
Description: A romance between a wealthy passenger and a working-class artist aboard the ill-fated maiden voyage of the R.M.S. Titanic.
Author: James Cameron

Title: Goodfellas
Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
Author: Martin Scorsese

Title: The Lion King
Description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father and learns the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
Author: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff

Title: Avatar
Description: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.
Author: James Cameron

Title: The Social Network
Description: The story of the creation of Facebook and the legal battles that followed, as told from the perspective of its founders.
Author: David Fincher

Description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another killer on the loose.
Author: Jonathan Demme

Author: James Cameron

Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
Author: Martin Scorsese

Title: The Lion King
Description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father and learns the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
Author: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff

Title: The Great Escape
Description: During World War II, a group of Allied prisoners in a German POW camp plan an ambitious escape.
Author: John Sturges
